name: Tonight肖林朋作品
intro:
tonight

作词：蚊子
作曲：蚊子
编曲、混音：肖林朋
钢琴、贝司、鼓、吉他：肖林朋

Verse1:
we sat in the dark on the tennis court
I saw your white sneakers when i loured my head
your pretty eyes just like shining stars
during the night
It seems like one million metres apart
I don't know why should i lock my door
right now the road is getting cold and blue
without you

Chorus1:
I see your face across the sea
in my dreams you never never let me down
take me back and hold me tight
just when i close my eyes tonight

Bridge:
we both know that everything has changed
you turned around and leave me here alone
so baby let it go
that's alright

Chorus1:
I see your face across the sea
in my dreams you never never let me down
take me back and hold me tight
just when i close my eyes tonight

Verse2:
we sat in the dark on the tennis court
I wanna hug you when you said you're cold
your pretty eyes just like shining stars
during the night
It seems like one million metres apart
I don't know why should i lock my door
right now the road is getting cold and blue
without you
